Package com.sanyavertolet.interview.utils

Class FunctionUtils

java.lang.Object
com.sanyavertolet.interview.utils.FunctionUtils
public class FunctionUtils extends Object
Utility class that provides logic for evaluating common functions, such as sum, count, and average, on a range of numeric values.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • sum

      public static Value sum(List<Value> values) throws ExpressionEvaluationException
      Calculates the sum of all numeric values within the provided list of arguments. The arguments must contain exactly one IterableValue representing a range of values.
      Parameters:
      values - the function arguments, which should contain one IterableValue.
      Returns:
      the sum of all numeric values in the range as a Value.
      Throws:
      ExpressionEvaluationException - if the argument is not an IterableValue.

      Parameters:
      values - the function arguments, which should contain one IterableValue.
      Returns:
      the count of all numeric values in the range as a Value.
      Throws:
      ExpressionEvaluationException - if the argument is not an IterableValue.
